name: Backstabber Hero
description:
This game was originally created for the js13k game jam 2019 that had Back as its theme. One month of development and a size limit of 13kb is a fun challenge but isn't a recipe for a game without flaws. The itch version is mainly untouched but adds music and is a bit more polished. The gameplay and level design isn't touched at all though. Just by adding music the file size grew ~500 times!

  • Original game jam version: https://js13kgames.com/entries/backstabber-hero
  • Created by Niklas Berg / The Infinite Monkey
  • Music from OpenGameArt: Laid Back by Spring Spring, Puppy Dog Swing by Spring Spring and Victorious by SpiderDave.
  • The game uses a heavily customized and outdated version of Kontra.js. 
  • Zzfx was used to create sound effects.
  • Interesting fact 1: The game randomizes skin colors at each run
  • Interesting fact 2: The game has a PWA manifest which means that you can install it on your android mobile. Not yet working on Itch.
